Html:
Hello!

Is there any examples of how to set width or height to a range of columns/rows?

except this one:
    foreach ($tableProperties['width'] as $param => $value)
        $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getColumnDimension($param)->setWidth(($value+0.83));        //+0.83 == offset
Looping through columns like in your example is currently the only way to do it.
ok, i will looping through columns. thanks.
